description:
Just as it seems Haku Gessho`s life will go back to normal, he finds out his reward from Unhi has been confiscated by the Tosan Clan. Down on his luck, Gessho then finds himself being handed over to the Unification League by his own father, but surprisingly, Oh Fuuki tells him that he is now free and the League will no longer interfere with is life. Celebrating his new found freedom, Gessho attempts to begin life anew, but is quickly interupted by Suusu seeking his help in finding a special book called the Book of Reincarnation. However, when youkai attack Gessho`s new school, Gessho and Suusu learn they are not the only ones seeking the book.
Source: crunchyroll
